alert.note: Alert for Adair; Linn; Macon; Putnam; Schuyler; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 11:52PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Adair, northeastern Linn, Sullivan, Putnam, western Schuyler and northwestern Macon Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1151 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Unionville to 10 miles northwest of Bucklin. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kirksville, Milan, Unionville, La Plata, Green City, Queen City, Novinger, Greentop, Greencastle, Gibbs, Millard, Pollock, Worthington, Elmer, Livonia, South Gifford, Kirksville Regional, New Boston, Winigan and Lemons. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Linn; Macon; Putnam; Schuyler; Sullivan
